table.name: rg_special_service
table.description: RG_SPECIAL_SERVICE contains the special services or equipment required for a lane. For example, a lane that goes from California to Alaska might require that the carrier use an airplane that can land in water. The special services entered in this table are required by the shipment but can't necessarily be performed by all carriers. The GC3 engine will check the table before looking at the cost information to determine which carriers can potentially handle the shipment. It does this because the cheapest carrier who doesn't have the special equipment cannot do the job regardless of cost.

columns.name: RATE_GEO_GID
columns.description: The GID for the rate geo.

columns.name: SPECIAL_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the special service.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
